product_name: Cannondale Pack Me Bike Vest - Men's
long_description: Not every day can be a perfect day, so stash the men's ultralight Cannondale Pack Me Vest for wind and moisture protection on your ride, just in case. 100% polyester fabric has a durable water repellent finish to help bead up light rain. Reflective accents aid visibility in low light. Packs into its own rear pocket for easy stowing in your jersey pocket or saddle bag. Cannondale Pack Me Vest for men features a semi-fitted cut and is great for running, too.
short_description: Not every day can be a perfect day, so stash the men's ultralight Cannondale Pack Me Vest for wind and moisture protection on your ride, just in case.
